dt: former state of south central India in the Deccan Plateau; capital Hyderabad

Hyderabad has served as the capital of Telangana since Telangana was split off from Andhra Pradesh in 2014. It also continues to serve as the capital of Andhra Pradesh, in which it formerly was located.
city on the Indus River in the southern Pakistan province of Sind {it}population{/it} 1,166,894

shortdef: former state of south central India in the Deccan Plateau; capital Hyderabad
city in Telangana, south central India population 7,204,000
city on the Indus River in the southern Pakistan province of Sind population 1,166,894
